alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:51AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Trumbull, Geauga, northeastern Cuyahoga, southern Lake and southwestern Ashtabula Counties through 430 AM EDT... At 350 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cleveland to near Burton to 9 miles northwest of Orwell. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Chardon, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Solon, Twinsburg, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Highland Hills, West Farmington, Chesterland, Bristolville, Garfield Heights, Shaker Heights, Maple Heights and South Euclid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull
